Posts.Content: hi everyone.  I was diagnosed with stage 3 Breast Cancer last Jan.  Nodes in clavicle and neck were effected. When I try for travel insurance they have no category for me!  It has left my armpit but I have not been diagnosed with secondary BC.  The cost increases almost 10 times (£300 plus).  I have talked on the phone to insurance agents but they cannot change their assessment formula.  I have to be insured as outside of armpit which then asks questions about secondary BC.  I am traveling to Netherlands from U.K.  Advice welcome! Jill (Doc's wife)
Posts.Title: Travel Insurance categories (secondary cancer or not?)

Posts.Content: Thank you Daloni. I have got a favorable quote from insurewith and I'm now waiting on a quote from MIA Insurance. I really appreciate the guidence and advice from you and others who posted previously.  So helpful. Jill
Posts.Title: Travel Insurance categories (secondary cancer or not?)
